direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return information derived from the expressionRegexp field, providing related functionalities.
Both methods interact with the expressionRegexp field and involve pattern matching operations.
The pattern() method in TreeRegexp class returns the Pattern object, similar to getRegexp().

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of related components (Pattern and ParameterTypeRegistry).
Setting up TreeRegexp is necessary before accessing the regular expression pattern.
Both methods involve verifying and handling patterns, making them suitable for assertions.
